meanings.definition: Godetias: a type of flowering plant
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful godetias swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I planted some godetias in my backyard to attract butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns among the godetias.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like a field of godetias in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the godetias lingered in the air long after they were gone.

meanings.definition: Godetias: plural form of godetia, referring to multiple plants of the same species
meanings.sent1: The godetias in the garden were a riot of colors.
meanings.sent2: She carefully tended to the godetias, ensuring they received enough sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit hopped through the godetias, leaving a trail of nibbled leaves.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of godetias, each one a unique beauty.
meanings.sent5: The godetias danced in the wind, their petals like delicate whispers.
